Name: Chedak Communications Multi-Band Comlink
Description: Almost all military personnel will integrate comms into their helmets, so this modification to one's armour is extremely common and easy to do. It can be applied to any armour that has some form of helmet.
Base Modification: Long Range Comlink is integrated into the helmet.

Name: Energy Dispersion System
Description: This system allows stun and electrical discharge to be soaked up by the armour.
Base Modification: Soak +2 against strain damage.

Name: In-Helmet Scanner
Description: This attachment integrates a general purpose scanner into the helmet as a HUD. This modification can only be equipped on armour including helmets.
Base Modification: Remove 1 setback die from darkness or lack of visibility. Allow the detection of heat sources up to medium range.

Name: Integrated Slicer Gear
Description: Building-in a computer system into one's outfit, along with the tools needed for slicing, allows one to conduct this illegal activity a little less conspicuously. It can be applied to any armour.
Base Modification: Count as having a Slicer Gear (controllable with simple gestures or vocal commands). Add 1 setback dice to all checks to identify that the character is slicing.

Name: Industrial Automaton "Accu-Strike" Integrated Targeting Computer
Description: A little more complex than the range finder, the computers and sensors in this attachment calculate the effect of more external factors to improve one's long range shots on opponents.
Base Modification: Add 1 boost dice to all Ranged attacks at Long or Extreme range.

Name: Low-Friction Coating
Description: By increasing the slickness of the armour, blades and melee attacks from an opponent may slip or graze the armour and deal less damage. The mod can only be applied to armour with solid plates which interlock such as heavy battle armour and powered armour.
Base Modification: Melee Defense +1, add 2 setback dice to mechanics checks to modify of maintain the armour.

Name: Tracking System
Description: This suite of sensors assist the wearer to find a target by using multiple sources of data. Often it is used alongside other tracking equipment to very rapidly catch a mark. This can be applied to any armour.
Base Modification: Upgrade ability of checks to track a designated target once. Spend a maneuver to designate a target while within line of sight - or having a tracker or comms line open.

Name: Physiological Enhancement System
Description: These custom-tailored systems are designed to improve the physiology of a wearer of the armour. Primarily designed by kaminoans for their clone soldiers, these may be tailoured for custom physiology when needed. It can be applied to any fully enclosed armour.
Base Modification: Reduce involuntary strain suffered by 1 (to minimum of 1). Add 1 boost dice to Athletics, Coordination, & Resilience checks.

Name: Enhanced Optic Suite
Description: This attachment enhaces the visuals and HUD of an enclosed helmet to improve the wearer's ability to view through obscured conditions. This can be applied to armour including a helmet.
Base Modification: Remove up to 2 setback dice imposed due to darkness, smoke or other environmental effects which obscure vision.

Name: Merr-Sonn VX Hands-Free Weapon System
Description: Mounting a rifle to one's shoulder is not as uncommon as it mayhaps should be. This attachment allows one to free their hands of a heavier weapon than you might be able to modify for a wrist mount. Can mount any Ranged (Light) or (Heavy) weapon with Encumbrance of 4 or less - uses 1 hard point on weapon. It can be applied to any armour.
Base Modification: Mount single weapon on the armour, allowing wearer to aim and fire without using hand or arms.

Name: Optical Camouflage System
Description: This armour modification installs a set of radiation shields which allows the suit to be masked optically. This can only be installed effectively on light armour (not laminate or heavy battle armour).
Base Modification: Upgrade ability of all stealth checks by 2.

Name: Portable Plasma Shield
Description: While a full-size plasma shield is one of the best ways of protecting one's life in battle, the emitter for such a shield is often bulky and more of an emplacement. This modification for armour allows one to carry a weightless shield into battle for when it may be needed. It can be applied to any armour with bracers.
Base Modification: Can activate the shield on forearm as an incidental. Cannot wield a two-handed weapon while shield is active. Grants Defensive 1 quality.

Name: Radiation Shielding
Description: Radiation is a natural and frequent threat to travelers around the galaxy, especially technicians working aboard starships. Adding some polymers and reflective shielding to one's armour can increase radiation resistance. It can be applied to any armour that can be fully sealed.
Base Modification: Add 2 boost dice to Resilience checks to resist radiation

Name: Reactive Plating
Description: By attaching explosives to detonate between two pieces of armour can make someone impervious from any attack... once. The mod can only be applied to armour with soak 2 or greater.
Base Modification: Encumbrance +4. For first hit taken, reduce damage by 10 - armour takes damage and does not benefit from this attachment until repaired.

Name: Reflec Adaptive Skin
Description: Applying "Reflec" to armour can make it much more stealth conducive. It is a polymer which has sensor-dampening and light-warping qualities. It can be applied to any armour.
Base Modification: Upgrade ability of all Stealth checks once.

Name: Reflec Shadowskin
Description: This coating absorbs light, making the armour its applied to blend with the darkness. The mod can only be applied to armour with soak 2 or less.
Base Modification: Add 1 advantage result to Stealth checks.
Mod Options: 1x "Innate Stalker Talent", 2x "Add 2 setback dice to Perception checks to find wearer."

Name: Reinforced Gauntlets
Description: Adding armour to the hands is often favoured among those who prefer heavy gear, assisting with safety during crafting and doubling as a weapon in close quarters combat. It can be applied to any armour with soak 2 or higher
Base Modification: May use gauntlets as a weapon with following profile; Skill: Melee , Dam: +1 , Crit: 4 , Range: Engaged , Qualities: Disorient 3

Name: Repulsor Pack
Description: Lacking the range and power of a true jetpack, this modification is a safer and reliable form of personal flight. Maxing out at 35km/h speeds, the small repulsorlift engines are mounted to the torso and legs, making the limbs especially important in flight.
Base Modification: Function as Speed 1, Handling -1, System Strain threshold 2 vehicle with maximum altitude of 75 metres. Uses Coordination to pilot.

Name: Repulsor-Assisted Lifting
Description: Commonly seen used by those working in warehouses and spaceport loading zones, this attachment consists of a suite of tiny repulsor-lift engines placed at the joints of the outfit. This can be applied to any armour.
Base Modification: Add 5 to Brawn for the purpose of determining Encumbrance threshold.
Mod Options: 2x "Add 1 to Brawn for the purpose of determining Encumbrance threshold.", 2x "Athletics skill +1."

Name: Retractable Wrist Blades
Description: Knives are a popular weapon carried by many warriors and troops due to their wide array of uses in a theater of war. Commando-type troopers and more underhanded units will incorporate their knives into their armour for quick use. It can be applied to any armour with bracers.
Base Modification: Deploy a wrist blade as an incidental with the following profile; Skill: Melee , Dam: +1 , Crit: 3 , Range: Engaged , Special: Pierce 1

Name: Squad Tactical Systems
Description: For squads which benefit from increased cohesion, this armour attachment increases sensor coverage. Feeding all data between troopers, based on what each see and hear, allows some to spot what others may have missed.
Base Modification: Add 1 boost dice to all Perception and Vigilance checks while within medium range of one or more allies using this attachment. Includes integrated comlink.

Name: Scannerweave
Description: This fabric consists of an advanced sensor-blocking textile, used to completely cloak a user from scanners and sensors. It can be applied to any armour.
Base Modification: Upgrade ability of all opposed Stealth checks against sensor and scanner operators once.

Name: Strength Enhancement System
Description: This set of attachments can be used to convert heavy armour into power-armour. This can only be applied to any laminate and full body hard armour suits.
Base Modification: Increase Brawn by 1 while wearing the armour.

Name: Stealth Field Generator
Description: When one wants to modify their favoured piece of armour rather than acquire a specialised suit, the Stealth Field generator will generally achieve the same goals in terms of Stealth. It can be applied to any armour.
Base Modification: Upgrade difficulty of all opposed Perception checks to spot the wearer once.
Mod Options: 2x "Add 1 setback die to opposed Perception checks to notice wearer."

Name: Stun Matrix
Description: By sending a discharge into a close quarters attacker, this attachment seeks to prevent a second attack.
Base Modification: Encumbrance +1. When hit by a melee/brawl/lightsaber weapon, may spend 2 disadvantages from check to disorient the attacker for 2 rounds.
Mod Options: 1x "Spend 3 disadvantages to immobilize attacker for 1 round.", 1x "Spend critical fail to stagger character for 1 round."

Name: Superior Armour Customization
Description: This modification is a set of tweaks and bits made to generally improve the armour.
Base Modification: Superior quality.

Name: Threat Monitor
Description: This suite of motion sensors and photo-receptors allow for a wearer to be constantly aware of their surroundings, or are at least warned of an incoming attack before it's too late.
Base Modification: Add 1 automatic advantage to Initiative checks.
Mod Options: 1x "Innate Quick Strike talent", 2x "Add 1 automatic advantage to Initiative checks."

Name: TaggeCo MB-7 "Ranger" Range Finder
Description: A simple computer integrated into the helmet with a visual sensor allows on-the-spot range calculations, allowing a long range fighter to appropriately lead and account for external factors when taking a shot. It can be applied to any armour that has a helmet.
Base Modification: Innate Sniper Shot talent.

Name: Tracking System
Description: This suite of sensors assist the wearer to find a target by using multiple sources of data. Often it is used alongside other tracking equipment to very rapidly catch a mark. This can be applied to any armour.
Base Modification: Upgrade ability of checks to track a designated target once. Spend a maneuver to designate a target while within line of sight - or having a tracker or comms line open.

Name: Whipcord Thrower
Description: This armour attachment is capable of quickly deploying a decent length of high-tensile-strength cable. This may save a user in case of a free fall, reaching objects that may be out of reach, or ensnaring an opponent. It can be applied to any armour with bracers.
Base Modification: May be used as climbing gear to assist in climbing a steep vertical surface, reducing difficulty by 1. Supports a weight of up to 200kg.

Name: Athakam Medtech SmartMed 2000 Integrated Med-Systems
Description: This allows armour to not only prevent injury, but also lessen the effects of wounds and even assist in recovery. This full-armour system allows one to keep fighting in spite of the punishment taken. It can be applied to any armour that covers the majority of the body.
Base Modification: Encumbrance +1. Once per session, may activate as an incidental - counting as a one use of a stimpack. All Medicine checks made to heal wearer gain 1 boost dice.
Mod Options: 2x "Heal 1 additional wound for all successful Medicine checks to heal wounds."

Name: Droid Brain Defense System
Description: Using a droid brain chip and installing a set of sensors on the armour, the wearer is alerted to incoming fire in some fashion. More advanced versions include mini repulsor generators that push the wearer out of harm\'s way.
Base Modification: Defense +1.

Name: Armour Spikes
Description: Attaching spikes onto one's armour is a sure way to keep others away. May be added to any armour which covers arms or legs.
Base Modification: When hit by a Melee/Brawl/Lightsaber attack, may use 3 disadvantages to deal 6 damage to attacker. Encumbrance +2.

Name: Bio-Support Dispenser
Description: This high tech medical technology is integrated into the battle-armour of a trooper. It comes with a bacta reserve for patching wounds in the middle of combat and sealing general injuries after combat.
Base Modification: When healing strain at end of an encounter, heal 1 wound as well. First time in an encounter that wounds exceeds half their wound threshold, armour automatically applies a stimpack to character.

Name: Biofeedback System
Description: This attachment allows automatic monitoring of the wearer's vital signs, and administers appropriate treatment when possible. This modification can only be equipped on full-body armour.
Base Modification: Strain Threshold +4

Name: Boot Blade
Description: Boot blades are an excellent method by which to avoid being unarmed in any situation. They are a common and relatively cheap modification to make. It can be applied to any armour that includes boots, shoes or other solid footwear.
Base Modification: Retractable blade counts as a weapon with following profile; Skill: Melee, Dam: +1, Crit: 3, Range: Engaged

Name: Ceremonial Adornment
Description: Protecting oneself in war times is paramount, however sometimes this may not be considered appropriate or even may be an affront in a diplomatic situation. These adornments make the armour less militaristic in nature, more pleasant to view. It can be applied to any armour.
Base Modification: Remove 2 setback dice from Social skill checks due to wearing armour in socially inappropriate situations. Add 1 setback dice to Coordination checks.

Name: Clone Polarized Electrobinoculars
Description: These binocular attachments are distributed liberally for long range combat deployments of Clone Troopers. They are easy to mount on the helmet, flipping up or down to the visor, providing light filtering and image sharpening. It can be applied to clone trooper armour.
Base Modification: Add 1 boost dice to sight-based Perception checks. Remove 1 setback dice from Perception checks due to distance or low-light conditions.

Name: Cortosis Weave
Description: This is a special alloy-mesh which is used to make the armour extremely resistant to energy weapons, typically used to protect against lightsabers. This can be applied to any armour.
Base Modification: Gain Cortosis quality.

Name: CryonCorp Omniscan 3 Integrated Scanner
Description: Scouting and Elite units often benefit from having some form of scanner, and having it integrated into one's helmet makes it especially convenient. It can be applied to any armour with a helmet.
Base Modification: Helmet has a General Purpose Scanner integrated. Add 1 boost dice to Perception checks to detect movement or hidden enemies.

Name: Custom Fit
Description: Standard sizes of armor allow for most to use the equipment without issue, but a few adjustments, the outfit may be optimized for a single user - to feel like a second skin. It can be applied to any armor.
Base Modification: Remove 1 setback die from Athletics and Stealth checks while wearing the armor.
Mod Options: 1x "Remove an additional setback die from Athletics and Stealth checks while wearing the armor."
